name: Anastasis (Lucas Viana)
description:
After escaping from limbo with Amy, Eve is at the relics cemetery, where she will start searching for the items which value is equal to a soul and body. Only after she delivers it making an equivalent trade, The Wishing Tree shall resurrect her. Throughout the game, the player will need to interact with objects to solve puzzles, follow leads, and proceed with the narrative.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:
  • Puzzle - Solve the puzzles to progress
  • Be careful of the monster - Stay out of sight so the monster can't detect your presence
  • Plot - While completing the game get immersed in the story of the protagonist

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team:

Game in development by Doomers Inc, a development team composed by students.

Guilherme Saturno - Game Designer & Project Manager

Lucas Viana - Game Programmer

Inês Barradas - Game Artist

Rita Saraiva - Game Artist

Ticiano Vieira - Sound Designer
